recipesJson.name: UnJuice
recipesJson.author: kindground
recipesJson.description:
I shamelessly stole this top voted July monthly recipe from kirkt on the diy_ejuice subreddit. Fuck it!

Great for flushing out wicks or just giving your tasters a break.

reviews.text: I mix at least 500 ML of this per month.  Best recipe on ATF PERIOD!
Recipe of the Century? I think so!
Any suggestions on what I can sub instead of Air?
It's like Jazz, man.  You gotta taste the flavors he *isn't* using.
Guess ill join in and pretend like i know whats going on.

This is quite possibly the most underrated recipe of all time. There is so much room for customization, and this base can fit into any recipe. The recipe says itâ€™s meant to be a shake and vape, but it really shines even after steeping for a month.

I mixed this at 80% VG instead of the 0% VG suggested by this mixer. Turns out to be a perfect clone of Liquid Barn's "BASIC eLiquid TM." Awesome, I have been spending way too much on that stuff, now I can make it myself at home. THANK YOU!  #RecipeofTheYear P.S. It's even better if you add some flavors to it.
Immaculate amount of flavor with this guy, just bursting with berries, color and air. Wouldfapagain/10
